elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} []The next Character you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.  {R} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn costs {1} less.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.  {R} Roll a die. On a 4+: You may discard target Character or Permanent.

{H} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.  {R} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: You may send to Reserve target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less.  {R} If you control one or more Landmarks: Target Character gains 1 boost.

{H} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.  {H} You may discard a Character from your Reserve. If you do: [Exhausted Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Spell you play this turn costs {1} less.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may return a card from your Reserve to your hand.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.  {J} You may discard a Character from your Reserve. If you do: You may exhaust target card in Reserve.

{H} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Draw a card.  {R} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Spell you play this turn costs {1} less.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.

elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Spell you play this turn costs {1} less.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.  At Dusk — You may have me gain [[Fleeting]]. If you do: You may have target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less other than me gain [[Anchored]].

{H} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.  {R} If your Reserve is empty: I gain 2 boosts, otherwise I gain 1 boost.

{J} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.  When you roll one or more dice — You may pay {1}. If you do: Target Character other than me gains 1 boost.

{H} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.  {R} []Roll a die. On a 4+, draw a card. On a 1-3, [Resupply].
{J} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn gains 1 boost.

{H} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.  {R} []You may discard target Permanent.

{R} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.  At Dusk — If your Reserve is empty: You may have target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less other than me gain [[Anchored]].

{H} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.  When my Expedition moves forward — You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: You may have target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less other than me gain [[Anchored]].

{J} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.  {H} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Draw a card, otherwise [Resupply].
{H} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []Target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less gains [[Anchored]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: The next card you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.  {H} You may have me gain [[Fleeting]]. If you do: Starting with you, each player may immediately play a card with Hand Cost {3} or less for free.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []Each Character controlled by target player gains [[Fleeting]].
